definition: To anticipate and make arrangements for future events or tasks, considering potential outcomes and taking proactive measures accordingly. This term is commonly employed when discussing the process of strategically planning ahead to ensure smooth execution and minimize potential obstacles.

examples.german: Ich muss vorausplanen, um rechtzeitig fertig zu werden.
examples.english: I need to plan ahead in order to finish on time.

examples.german: Es ist wichtig, vorausplanen zu können.
examples.english: It is important to be able to plan ahead.

examples.german: Wir sollten vorausplanen, um mögliche Probleme zu vermeiden.
examples.english: We should plan ahead to avoid potential problems.

examples.german: Vorausplanen hilft dabei, effizienter zu arbeiten.
examples.english: Planning ahead helps to work more efficiently.

examples.german: Man sollte immer vorausplanen, um unerwartete Situationen zu bewältigen.
examples.english: One should always plan ahead to handle unexpected situations.
